main event: A woman observer in Denmark reported seeing a big black low-flying object described as a spaceship on April 15, 1958.
interesting points: The spaceship had a white and yellow circle that seemed to move and shift while emitting strong lights,About 20 other witnesses saw a triangular-shaped object around the same time,One witness described the sighting as a 'sea of flames',Danish officials appealed for corroborating witnesses,It is possible that this sighting was related to other reports from different parts of Denmark.
sighted object: big black low-flying object described as a spaceship
witness description: A woman and about 20 other witnesses
